ComicInfo.Title: Down in the Cellar; The Killers!; The Pit of Horror!; The Ghoul!; Too Old to Live
ComicInfo.Summary:
A taxidermist who loves birds kills and stuffs the hunters who bring them in and puts them in the basement.
Man tries to control the population numbers of a strange creature from the lake, and by poisoning them off, they realize that they have destroyed the species that was controlling the numbers of an even worse creature.
Satan's imps get lazy so he brings an efficiency expert down from Earth to whip them back into shape, and when he is done he wants to go back to Earth, but Satan tells him not to bother since he only has about three minutes to live and because so many people hated him he is going to be their first customer.
A murderer attempting to hide in a cemetery is picked up by a couple of troopers on suspicion of being a ghoul. He eludes them and takes refuge in a swamp shack where he is attacked by the ghoul the police were on the lookout for.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Authorized A. C. M. P. Conforms to the Comics Code
ComicInfo.Penciller: Paul Cooper,Bernie Krigstein,Bill Everett,Vic Carrabotta,Joe Certa
